items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- We’ve updated our timeless straight collar poplin shirt for a new season.
- Now pre-washed and slightly brushed for a distinctive feel.
items.name: MEN Broadcloth Regular Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: A soft shirt with a distinctive texture.

items.composition: Body: 72% Cotton, 28% Polyester/ Rib: 73% Polyester, 27% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- With DRY technology.
- Basic sleeves make this easy to match.
- A versatile high-performance polo shirt that is perfect for both business and everyday wear.
items.name: Dry Pique Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
items.shortDescription: A basic polo shirt with DRY technology. Unlimited styling possibilities.

items.longDescription:
- Incredibly quick-drying DRY-EX fabric.
- Cotton-like, casual look.
items.name: MEN Dry-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Our quick-drying T-shirt keeps you feeling fresh. Cotton-look fabric for a casual style.

items.longDescription:
- Jersey material with a crisp woven look.
- Pull-on waist design makes them comfortable and easy to wear.
- Relaxed fit, streamlined ankle length pants that taper towards the hem.
- Casual design that is perfect for wearing out and about.
items.name: MEN Washed Jersey Ankle Pants
items.shortDescription: Versatile colors and workwear-style details.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material dries sweat and moisture incredibly quickly. We’ve added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you feeling fresh even in sweaty situations.
- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Printed Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick-drying, smooth, and feels fresh. The perfect fit for every situation with carefully selected coloring.

items.longDescription:
- The shorter length creates a more balanced look when untucked.
- 100％ extra-fine cotton with ultra-long fibers.
- Durable fabric with a glossy sheen.
- Special pre-wash process for an extra soft feel.
- The thread count has been specially calibrated for each color and pattern.
- Regular straight fit is sleek yet unrestrictive.
- We’ve used two types of interlining in the collar for a crisp look and a soft feel.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- Flat felled seams at the armholes and underarms for minimal skin contact.

items.longDescription:
- Uses quick-drying AIRism.
- Lengthened the sleeves for a streamlined silhouette.
- Changed to a finer filament thread for the stitching on the outside to match the fabric.
- Provides UV protection.
- Reduced seams for a cleaner look.
- Smooth, quick-drying AIRism feels cool to the touch.
- Elegant fine stripes.
- Minimal fly front thanks to a hidden placket.
items.name: MEN AIRism Fly Front Polo Short Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Silky and refreshing. A hidden placket creates a cleaner look.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
items.name: AIRism Bedsheet (Queen)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.
items.washingInformation:
Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long staple cotton with a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- Particular attention has been given to the threads, which are light with moderate thickness for a balanced casual look.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette that makes use of the draping feel of the fabric.
- This item has a well-balanced silhouette that is thin and easy to move around in but looks neat.
- This one-wash item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special press-processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar tip and the collar height, and used a firm neck for the base collar and a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By focusing on the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The arm holes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded-down so that it does not touch your skin.
- This item can be used for any occasion and is great for day-to-day coordination.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Improved to provide a more trendy straight silhouette. Less brushing for more beautiful colors and patterns.

items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long cotton fibers with a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- An item that balances both a casual and high-quality look.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette that makes use of the draping feel of the material.
- This item has a well-balanced silhouette that is thin and easy to move around in but looks sleek.
- This single-wash item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar and used a firm neck for the base collar with a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By reducing the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The armholes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded down so that it does not touch your skin.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Improved to provide a more on-trend straight silhouette. Less brushing for more beautiful colors and patterns.

items.longDescription:
- Updated by using a material that doesn't wrinkle after washing.
- 100% fine cotton made from ultra-long cotton fibers.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Stand Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Made with fine cotton to reduce wrinkles after washing. Made with a breathable comfortable fabric.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.
- Refined fabrics and a clean silhouette make this shirt a good choice.
- The hem is narrow, so it's roomy, but it's also comfortable, and is great for an active lifestyle.
- It's finished with elastic around the waist and snap buttons at the front for a laid-back look and flat-knit comfort.
items.name: EZY Jogger Trousers
items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. High-performance fabric and an uneven hem for a sporty look.

items.longDescription:
- 100% fine cotton made from ultra-long cotton fibers.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.
- This season's updated design features adding extra space at the inseam for a comfortable, tapered fit.
- Refined fabrics and a clean ankle-length cut make this a perfect choice.
- The waist has snap buttons and elastic on the inside for an easy feel and a flat design.
items.name: MEN EZY Ankle Trousers (Extra stretch DRY-EX)
items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. Enhanced the materials and cut for added comfort.

items.longDescription:
- Layers well.
- Just the right amount of softness for a laid-back feel.
items.name: Linen Cotton Stand Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: We adjusted the shoulder, chest, and hem for a more modern and loose fit.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material dries sweat and moisture quickly.
- We’ve added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you feeling fresh even in sweaty situations.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX UV Cut Printed Full-Zip Hoodie
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick-drying, and is smooth and feels cool. Single layer that is easy to carry for convenience and design.

items.longDescription:
- Cotton material with moderate stretch for ultimate comfort.
- Washed look adds depth to the color.
- Elastic waist makes it easy to put them on and take them off.
- Ankle length creates a clean look.
- Design is perfect for wearing them outside of your home too.
- The new design this season features a slightly different silhouette for more comfort.
- New fashionable drawstrings are prefect for wearing them outside of your home.
items.name: MEN Cotton Relaxed Ankle Pants
items.shortDescription: Just as comfortable as before, the new design and the silhouette let you wear them outside of your home.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made from 100% high-quality 19.5 micron wool.
- The fabric is lightweight and airy, yet warm.
- Mercerized Merino wool feels incredibly soft.
- Mid-gauge WHOLEGARMENT construction.
- Garter stitch at the armholes and shoulders.
items.name: MEN 3D Extra Fine Merino Crew Neck Sweater
items.shortDescription: A comfy seamless 3D knit. In warm 100% premium wool.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Soft touch polyester-rayon blend flannel.
- Slightly brushed for extra warmth.
- Wide cut that tapers toward the ankle and a comfortable drawstring waist.
- Perfect for working from home.
- Matching jacket available.
- Versatile fabric and design.
items.name: MEN Flannel Relaxed Wide Fit Trousers
items.shortDescription: Soft brushed flannel pants. Perfect for working from home.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made with soft polyester-rayon flannel fabric.
- The slightly brushed surface creates an extra warm look.
- The boxy oversized cut means it also styles as an outer layer.
- A brushed checked shirt with a vintage style.
items.name: MEN Heavy Flannel Oversized Checked Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: A soft flannel shirt with a brushed feel. Also styles as an outer layer.

items.longDescription:
- Made with Ultra Stretch fabric.
- Ultra Stretch satin stretches and recovers quickly.
- Finely brushed to produce an elegant, glossy sheen.
- Relaxed tapered cut with a roomy fit around the waist.
- Stretch waistband for a sleek look with no gathers around the waist.
- Hook closures on the front.
- Sleek ankle length design.
- Perfect for relaxing at home or wearing out and about.
items.name: MEN Extra Stretch Comfort Trousers
items.shortDescription: Elegant texture, comfortable to wear. Convenient and verstile pants.

items.composition: Body: 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton/ Rib: 70% Polyester, 30% Cotton/ Hood Lining: 63% Polyester, 37% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- Newly updated with narrower tape for a more streamlined design.
- With quick-drying DRY technology.
- Stretch material allows easy movement.
- Zippered pocket for storage with a convenient pull tab.
- The sleeves have been redesigned with a slightly looser cut for easy movement.
- Featuring a hole and loop for earphones.
- A great choice for working out or to wear as athleisure.

items.shortDescription: A light, comfortable hoodie for an active lifestyle.

items.longDescription:
- Made with Ultra Stretch fabric.
- With DRY technology.
- Amazing stretch and a light feel for complete comfort.
- Exceptional stretch accommodates any kind of movement.
- Crisp fabric traps a layer of air to maintain a comfortable temperature.
- Relaxed cut.
- Raglan sleeves for ease of movement.
- Details include a secure zip pocket and a zipper pull for easy access.
- Ideal for sports or everyday wear.
items.name: Ultra Stretch Dry Sweatshirt

items.longDescription: - this item has a modern silhouette, while also looking to achieve the casual feel of sweats.
items.name: MEN Sweat Full-Zip Hoodie
items.shortDescription: 100% French terry cotton, with a puffiness that adds further comfort to the materials.

items.longDescription: - Added durable water-repellent coating that repels rain water.
items.name: MEN Pocketable UV Cut Parka
items.shortDescription: Light and easy to carry, and can be worn anytime anywhere. UV cut material is used for improved functionality.

items.composition: Body: Woven: 100% Polyester/ Rib: 96% Polyester, 4% Elastane
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Relaxed cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- Hybrid design incorporates fleece with the optimal pile where it is needed, combining looks and functionality.
- The chest pocket is made of woven fabric that keeps its shape even when carrying items.
items.name: MEN WM Fleece Oversized Long Sleeve Jacket
items.shortDescription: Warm look and feel. Packed with practical design details. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person

items.composition: Body: 56% Acrylic, 39% Polyester, 5% Wool/ Trim: 100% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- A cardigan made with flannel-like wool blend fleece fabric.
- Military-inspired details including piping and woven placket backing.
- Perfectly designed for storage with exterior pockets plus an inside patch pocket.
- Versatile outerwear that’s also great for layering.
- The Uniqlo U mélange color makes this an instant star of your wardrobe.
items.name: MEN Fleece Cardigan
items.shortDescription: Carefully selected fabrics, design, and details. A superb combination of style and practicality.

items.composition: Face: 100% Nylon/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Pocketable design.
- Anti-static lining.
- Resin-coated lining.
- Fill power of over 640.
- Storage pouch matches the pocket fabric. *Slight color difference from the outer fabric.
items.name: MEN Ultra Light Down Wave Quilt Jacket
items.shortDescription: Thin, light, and warm. Quilted lines add a stylish design accent.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Nylon, (40% Nylon, Reclaimedfrommanufacturing)filling: Body: 85% Recycleddown, 15% Recycledfeathers/ Pocket: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Nylon, (43% Nylon, Reclaimedfrommanufacturing)rib: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made from 50% nylon recycled from UNIQLO down products donated by customers and staff.
- Sustainable design.
- Features a fitted cut and meticulous attention to detail.
- A versatile, unisex layering piece.
- Updated shoulder design.
- Developed with recycled down as part of our sustainability efforts.
items.name: MEN Recycled Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: An eco-conscious cardigan made using recycled down. Perfect for layering.

items.composition: Face: 66% Polyester, 34% Cotton/ Back: 66% Polyester, 34% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Water-repellent bonded triple-layer fabric made from polyester and cotton.
- The hood and front placket block out wind and rain.
- Boxy cut with a longer hem at the back for extra coverage.
- A modern blouson made with performance fabric in an on-trend cut and colors.
- Convenient pockets for storing cellphones and other gadgets.
items.name: MEN Oversized Mountain Parka
items.shortDescription: Performance fabric and meticulous detail. A practical parka for protection against wind and rain.

items.composition: Face: 100% Nylon [Filling] Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers [Shoulder] Inner Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers [Shoulder] Outer Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Pocketable design that is compact in size and can be carried around.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Uses a special inner-lining to prevent static electricity.
- This season’s updates includes a wider quilt for a more casual look.
- In response to customer feedback, we changed the size to make it look neat and not too tight.
- The collar stands up firmly and looks sharp.
- Three-dimensional gusset under the armpit makes it easy to move your arms.
- In a stylish matte finish.
items.name: MEN Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: A thin, light, and warm down jacket. Attention has been paid to the design and comfort of each part.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Front Body: Back Body: From The Waist Up: Top Sleeve: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back Body: From The Waist Down: Back Body: Yoke: Shoulder: Under Sleeve: Sides of The Item: Pocket: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Only one part is made with absorbent bio-warming padding.
- The relaxed, voluminous cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- Features UNIQLO's unique hybrid design.
- Contoured 3D cut designed for easy movement.
- Excellent storage capability, with a total of six pockets as well as a handwarmer.
- Shape-memory fabric with a subtle glossy sheen, great for wearing out and about.
items.name: MEN WM Hybrid Down Parka
items.shortDescription: The cut, design, and textures used to create the concept combine superb function and style. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person
